metadata.title: CVE-2022-42721 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A list management bug in BSS handling in the mac80211 stack in the Linuxkernel 5.1 through 5.19.x before 5.19.16 could be used by local attackers(able to inject WLAN frames) to corrupt a linked list and, in turn,potentially execute code.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
